definition: blood relations/one's own flesh and blood/kin
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: But it is difficult to determine what gentile name was borne by married women.
sentences.chinese: 但是，確定已婚婦女的血族名稱卻成了一種困難。

sentences.english: Societies retain their tribal structures based on extended family kinships and clientage.
sentences.chinese: 社會保持了基於家族血族關係和委託關係的宗族結構。

definition: leech/bloodsucking vermin/vampire (translated European notion)/fig. cruel exploiter, esp. a capitalist exploiting the workers
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
the Papacy/the Vatican/the Church government/Holy See
Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
berserker (Norse warrior or fantasy role-playing character)
Cain (name)/Cain (biblical character), a figure of Judeo-Christian-Muslim mythology
